name: Medal of Honor: Rising Sun
synopsis: The epic saga of World War II continues with Medal of Honor Rising Sun.  Play as Marine Corporal Joseph Griffin in a far-reaching tale of two brothers trying to prevent Japanese forces from dominating the Pacific.  Rising Sun features real-life historical battles like Pearl Harbor and Guadalcanal, over 20 authentic WWII weapons, highly intelligent enemies, and a heroic cast of characters that fight on your side from level to level.  Battle other soldiers in ten multiplayer levels and an all-new two-player co-op mode.
